channel.title: RuneSource problem
channel.description:
I downloaded the original RuneSource and when I run it and try to login using my external IP, I get error connecting to server. This is only with RuneSource - with any other base I am able to login. I can login using localhost but not my external IP.
Any ideas?

item.title: RuneSource problem
item.dc:creator: @XxJtxX XxJtxX
item.description:
@XxJtxX wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:2, topic:464903”]Change it to 0.0.0.0, I had the same problem.[/quote]I said it worked with localhost and that it won’t work using my external IP…

Edit: Did you even read my post?

Read full topic
